champ:ChampionCrown.NAME: Champion's Crown
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, enter #bDefensive or #rBerserker Stance.

champ:BlackKnightHelmet.NAME: Black Knight's Helm
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you enter each Stance each combat: NL #bDefensive: Gain #b2 Dexterity and lose #b1 Strength. NL #rBerserker: Gain #b2 Strength and lose #b1 Dexterity.

champ:Barbells.NAME: Barbell
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, if you have at least #b10 non-Upgraded cards in your deck, #yUpgrade one at random.

champ:BerserkersGuideToSlaughter.NAME: Berserker's Guide
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b3 #yVigor.

champ:ChampionCrownUpgraded.NAME: Victorious Crown
champ:ChampionCrownUpgraded.FLAVOR: Conglaturation!! You are the greatest winner.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #rChampion's #rCrown. NL Start each combat in #ychamp:Ultimate #yStance, which lasts for #b2 turns.

champ:DeflectingBracers.NAME: Deflecting Bracers
champ:DeflectingBracers.FLAVOR: If you thought blocking was good then...
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #ychamp:Counter equal to half the amount of expired #yBlock.

champ:DuelingGlove.NAME: Dueling Glove
DESCRIPTIONS: After using a single-target #yAttack, if the target has no #yVulnerable, apply #b1 #yVulnerable.

champ:FightingForDummies.NAME: Dolphin's Style Guide
champ:FightingForDummies.FLAVOR: Author: Renowned explorer and pugilist Dolphin K. Mist.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you end your turn while in no #yStance, draw #b1 additional card next turn.

champ:GladiatorsBookOfMartialProwess.NAME: Gladiators Manual
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yCombo, a #yFinisher, and enter a #yStance in the same turn, gain #b1 #yStrength and #yDexterity.

champ:PowerArmor.NAME: Power Armor
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL Your maximum #yVigor and #ychamp:Counter is #b10.

champ:SignatureFinisher.NAME: Signature Finisher
champ:SignatureFinisher.FLAVOR: And now, it's time for my ULTIMATE MOVE!
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a #yFinisher. This #yFinisher costs #b0, can be used without a #yStance, and never causes your #yStance to be exited.
costs 0, can be used without a #yStance, and never causes your #yStance to be exited.

champ:SpectersHand.NAME: Spectre's Hand
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you Enter a Stance, gain a basic #yStrike or #yDefend. It costs #b0 and has #yExhaust.

champ:LiftRelic.NAME: Inner Strength
champ:LiftRelic.FLAVOR: It's about the gigantic sword in your heart.

champ:ChampStancesModRelic.NAME: New Challenger
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat in a random Champ #yStance.
